summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: kastu Green Tea Moisturized Face Clean Mask Stick Facial Clean Mud Deep Cleanse Mask for All Skin Types
Review Date: 2022/05/27
Store: kastu
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'kastu', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Hydrating,Cleansing,Provides Vitamins', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 3.07 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '751474920263'}
Review Text: I have very sensitive skin and this stuff is great. I have adult acne and break out with my cycle but since using this it hasn't been as bad and I am seeing a visual difference in my pores and this is the only change in my routine. Would recommend even to those with sensitive skin
Review Title: Works great
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: YERMA Aloe Charcoal Blackhead Peel Off Face Mask with Aloe Vera Serum SKINCARE & Brush, Blackhead Remover 3-in-1 CLEAN SKIN SOLUTION SET - Exfoliating & Hydrating & Anti Aging Deep Cleansing for Dirt, Oil, Acne
Review Date: 2022/06/07
Store: Yerma
Product Description: ['[ALOE & CHARCOAL SERUM SET] - Peel of pack that contains deeply purifying Charcoal Powder and Aloe to provide moisture while removing sebum and dry skin cells without irritation. Soothing serum with Aloe which provides elasticity and protective layer on the skin, while making the skin smooth and moisturized. [DEEP CLEANSING MASK] - The powerful activated aloe charcoal face mask works strong and deeply to get rid of blackheads, impurities, dirt, acne and excess oil. After peel off mask apply the aloe ampoule serum to helps repairing & relaxing redness skin, mainly helps shrinking the large pores to make your face keep soft and smooth. [NATURAL ACTIVE INGREDIENT] - Our blackhead peel mask is made with aloe charcoal and aloe vera. Aloe charcoal have a good adsorption force, which can remove oil and blackheads. Aloe vera has a soothing and anti-inflammatory effect witch helps shrink pores. Mild and low- irritating help facial clean. [FOR ALL SKIN TYPES USE] - For Aloe charcoal clean peel off pack, apply an adequate amount to your skin, while avoiding the eye and mouth area. Peel gently after 30 min when the mask is completely dry. For Aloe Ampoule Serum, apply adequate amount over your face, then gently pat for better absorption. [100% SATISFACTION] - Please assure that we always stand behind our blackhead peel off mask. Should you for any reason be unhappy with your purchase, we provide you excellent customer support, please feel free to contact us. We will do our best to resolve your issues.']
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Yerma', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Unit Count': '3.52 Fl Oz', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Hydrating,Soothing,Acne,Cleansing,Exfoliating,Anti-aging', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.61 x 3.94 x 2.01 inches; 8.64 Ounces'}
Review Text: I don't love it. I don't hate it. The smell isn't over bearing. It didn't cause a reaction in my face. I just don't like how my face feels after using it
Review Title: Just meh
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Ultimate Essentials Kit
Review Date: 2022/08/13
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Olaplex', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Benefits': 'Repairs, Strengthens & Protects hair. Restores texture. Adds shine.', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.38 x 4.88 inches; 7.83 Ounces', 'UPC': '850018802420', 'Manufacturer': 'Olaplex'}
Review Text: This made my hair dry. I can't down it too harshly as I know people IRL that swear by it and love it. But for it just didn't cut it.
Review Title: Can't down too harshly
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Touchland Disney Hydrating Hand Sanitizer | Limited Edition Mickey Mouse | Citrus, Lavender, Aloe, Unscented | 500-Sprays each, 1FL OZ (Set of 4)
Review Date: 2022/08/16
Store: Touchland
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Touchland', 'Unit Count': '4 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Scent': 'Disney 4-pack', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Package Dimensions': '10.39 x 10.31 x 1.54 inches; 1.04 Pounds', 'UPC': '850028448243', 'Manufacturer': 'Touchland'}
Review Text: I love this to keep in my purse. With 3 kids that have to touch everything this is really convenient and doesn't dry our hands out. No worries about trigging any of our sensitivities either as they are unscented. Would be a great gift for any Disney fanatic or a great gift to yourself.
Review Title: Awesome
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:  
The user has had several positive experiences with various products. Notably, they found a face mask to be effective for sensitive skin, reporting visible improvements in skin condition and recommending it to others. A hand sanitizer was praised for its convenience and non-drying formula, especially for families with kids, suggesting it's a reliable choice. Furthermore, a wax product was highly rated for its ease of use, as it melted well and effectively managed unwanted hair without causing sensitivities. Overall, the user enjoyed practical and effective products that catered to unique skin care needs.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:  
The user has expressed dissatisfaction with certain products, primarily due to ineffectiveness. They described a hair care kit as having left their hair dry, despite acknowledging its popularity among others. Additionally, a face mask was met with indifference, where the user found the results unsatisfactory and the aftermath uncomfortable. This indicates a struggle to find suitable products that align with their specific needs and preferences, highlighting the challenge of product matching in their shopping experiences.

OVERALL SUMMARY:  
The user's purchase history reflects a mixed bag of experiences. They highlighted several effective products that catered to specific skin and family needs, particularly appreciating the convenience and results of certain face and hair care items. Conversely, they've also encountered products that did not live up to expectations, leading to disappointment with their performance. This suggests a learning curve, as the user seeks out better-suited items while navigating varying results in their beauty and personal care journeys.
